short_summary: Sustaining Engineering Support Services for Phase E of James Webb Space Telescope
description: data management services and operations sustaining engineering support services for the on-orbit hardware and software related to the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST)
full_summary:
=====================================

# Advance Contract Award Notice - Sustaining Engineering Support Services for James Webb Space Telescope

## Reference Information
------------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS4406797913
* **Procurement Number**: 4406867794
* **Publication Date**: January 24, 2024

## Tender Information
---------------------

* **Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Description
-------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has awarded a contract for **Sustaining Engineering Support Services for James Webb Space Telescope**, Phase E.

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) requires data management services and operations sustaining engineering support services for the on-orbit hardware and software related to the Flight Fine Guidance Sensor (FGS) and the Near Infrared Imager and Slitless Spectrograph (NIRISS) flight instruments onboard the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST).

The contract is for a period of estimated months (no end date specified).

## Vendor Information
-----------------

The vendor is required to submit the Statement of Capabilities (SOC), which details the full scope of work that the vendor must provide and deliver.

## Contact Information
------------------

For more information, please contact:

* **Contact Name**: Dalia Bahidj (PSPC/SPAC)
* **Contact Email**: [dalia.bahidj@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dalia.bahidj@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Important Notes
-----------------

Please note that the closing time for submitting bids was extended until February 8, 2024, at 14:00 EST. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the specified deadline.
